Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I don't fully trust some of the AI results and feedback so if I receive feedback from the AI and my teacher, I lean towards that of my teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I think I feel very similar about both. The feedback from AI can feel a little less critical because you know it is coming from a machine and is very technical.
